name: Use Your Words
description: Use Your Words is the new party game for funny people and their unfunny friends! Laugh your way through four hilarious mini-games! Use your smartphone to fill in the blank, or try your luck using one of our answers to get laughs! No matter your strategy, Use Your Words brings comedy home!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
